amendment.description: To ensure FBI work force is properly allocated to meet the FBI's mission requirements and priorities.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3219 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3219 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Murray. (consideration: CR S12723; text: CR S12723) To ensure FBI work force is properly allocated to meet the FBI's mission requirements and priorities.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3219 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Murray.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3219 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
